pullRequest.title: Update API interface for preview-2 and bug fixes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Updates the API interface based on feedback from API view. https://apiview.dev/Assemblies/Review/6af850ed7eb04843a6897afbe13cdd28/
Fixes a bug where, when no item is emitted, peekBatch can throw a NoElementException.
Consolidates creation of receivers and senders into IntegrationTestBase.

commit.message:
Adding ServiceBusMessageContext.
Adding dead-letter reason and description.
Adding deserialization for them.
Fixing ServiceBusMessageTest after ctor is removed.
Move ServiceBusAsyncConsumer as package-private class into main.
Fix build breaks in ManagementChannel and ServiceBusAsyncConsumerTest
Adding methods for receiving and completing.

nodes.bodyText: I gave some of the comment in PR  #10680  about this and some documentation.
To avoid using doing mistake and not setting session id :  Sets the name of the subscription in the topic to listen to. You must also set {@code subscriptionName}.
